name: Inherit the Earth: Quest for the Orb
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select GOG installer
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  game_id: ite
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      find "$src" -maxdepth 1  -type d \( -iname graphics -o -iname music -o -iname
      patch -o -iname sound  \) -exec cp {} -r "$dst" \;


      find "$src" -maxdepth 1  -type f \( -iname "*voices" -o -iname "*.bin" -o -iname
      "*.rsc" -o -iname "*.iaf" -o -iname "*.AD" -o -iname "*.OPL"  \) -exec cp {}
      "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- execute:
    args: $CACHE $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
scummvm:
  fullscreen: true
